_comment: This global loot modifier is used to apply the dragon survival loot table to a bunch of vanilla loot tables.
_comment2: This is done by filtering for vanilla chests using the tables_to_apply field, which supports regex.
_comment3: The table field is the loot table that will be added on top of the applied loot tables.
_comment4: This loot modifier can also be run in blacklist mode. To do this, add a blacklist field with a value of true.
